name: precious metal refinery construction | precious metal refinery | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/6605/documentation

The precious metal plant is equipped as follows: 1 Electrolyte cell, 1 Eluation cell, 5 Electrowinning cell, 1 Calcination furnace, 1 Smelting furnace, 1 Electrorefining cell. A building hall houses the equipment covering 5'000m2. The service life time assumed is 25 years, the yearly capacity of anode slime treatment is 243 t.;[This dataset was already contained in the ecoinvent database version 2. It was not individually updated during the transfer to ecoinvent version 3. Life Cycle Impact Assessment results may still have changed, as they are affected by changes in the supply chain, i.e. in other datasets. This dataset was generated following the ecoinvent quality guidelines for version 2. It may have been subject to central changes described in the ecoinvent version 3 change report (http://www.ecoinvent.org/database/ecoinvent-version-3/reports-of-changes/), and the results of the central updates were reviewed extensively. The changes added e.g. consistent water flows and other information throughout the database. The documentation of this dataset can be found in the ecoinvent reports of version 2, which are still available via the ecoinvent website. The change report linked above covers all central changes that were made during the conversion process.]

The activity starts with the occupaiton and transformation of unspecifield land.

Construction of facilities and housing, and their disposal. No transports and construction work considered.
category: F:Construction/41:Construction of buildings/410:Construction of buildings/4100:Construction of buildings

processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data describes a Swedish plant that is singular in the region and ranges worldwide among the big producer. It may be taken as approximation for the global situation
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Due to high temperature chromium steel and refractory materials are used. Kaldo converter and converter aisle considered.
processDocumentation.dataTreatmentDescription: see Geography and Technology This dataset has been copied from an original dataset covering the geography SE. The uncertainty has been adjusted accordingly.
